Item.name: Empty Plate
Item.description: An empty plate to put food on. Can be thrown.

Item.name: Empty Bowl
Item.description: An empty bowl to put food in. Can be thrown.

Item.name: Dirty Plate
Item.description: A dirty plate that needs some cleaning either by hand or in a dishwasher. Can be thrown.

Item.name: Dirty Bowl
Item.description: A dirty bowl that needs some cleaning either by hand or in a dishwasher. Can be thrown.

Item.name: Dirty Fork
Item.description: A dirty fork that needs some cleaning either by hand or in a dishwasher. Eating with it may make you sick.

Item.name: Dirty Spoon
Item.description: A dirty spoon that needs some cleaning either by hand or in a dishwasher. Eating with it may make you sick.
